subject: Quarterly Review Meeting
body: Hi team, please prepare the quarterly results and schedule a review meeting with the leadership by next Friday. We need to finalize action items and update the strategy document.

subject: Invoice Reminder
body: Dear vendor, this is a friendly reminder to send the invoice for the recent engagement. Please submit the invoice by the end of this week to avoid delays.

subject: Lunch Invitation
body: Hey there! Let's catch up for lunch next Wednesday at the cafe downtown. Let me know if that works for you.

subject: You won a prize!
body: Congratulations! You have been selected to win a cash prize. Click the link to claim your lottery winnings now.
